title: Add New Task with Required Fields
description: Verify that a new task can be added by filling all required fields including task type, title, and deadline, and that it appears correctly in the task list.

steps.description: Navigate to the 'Tambah Tugas' (Add Task) screen.
Select a valid task type (Kuliah or Non-Kuliah).
Fill in the task title and set a valid deadline.
Leave optional fields empty and save the task.
Verify that the task is saved and displayed in the task list with correct status TODO and default priority.

title: Add New Task with All Details Populated
description: Verify the creation of a task when all fields including course name, submission type, links, notes, priority, and category are provided.

steps.description: Navigate to 'Tambah Tugas' screen.
Select task type Kuliah.
Fill in title, course name, submission type, link, notes, deadline, priority HIGH and assign a category.
Save the task.
Verify that the task saves all details and displays correctly in task list and detail view.

title: Validate Required Fields in Task Creation
description: Verify that creating a task without required fields (e.g., no title or deadline) shows appropriate validation errors and prevents saving.

steps.description: Navigate to 'Tambah Tugas' screen.
Attempt to save a task without entering title.
Check that validation error for missing title is shown and task is not saved.
Attempt to save a task without entering deadline.
Check that validation error for missing deadline is shown and task is not saved.

title: Cycle Task Status from TODO to DONE
description: Verify that tapping or swiping a task cycles its status sequentially from TODO to PROGRESS to DONE and records completion timestamp when done.

steps.description: Navigate to task list.
Tap on a TODO status task once.
Verify the status changes to PROGRESS.
Tap/swipe the task again.
Verify the status changes to DONE and completion timestamp is recorded.

title: Edit Existing Task Details
description: Verify that updating task details such as title, deadline, priority, and category is saved and reflected properly in the task list and details.

steps.description: Navigate to a specific task detail view.
Edit title, adjust deadline, change priority, update category.
Save the changes.
Verify all changes appear correctly in the task detail and task list.

title: Delete Note and Confirm Removal
description: Verify the user can delete a note and that it is removed from the note list.

steps.description: Navigate to notes list.
Select a note and delete it.
Verify the note no longer appears in the notes list.

title: Create and Edit Note with Category
description: Verify that notes can be created with categories and edited later with category changes reflected.

steps.description: Navigate to add note screen.
Create a new note including a category assignment.
Save the note.
Verify the note appears in the category filter.
Edit the note changing its category.
Verify the note appears under new category and not old.

title: Add Recurring Schedule Event
description: Verify that a schedule event can be created with a recurrence rule (e.g., weekly) and displays correctly in calendar views.

steps.description: Navigate to add schedule event screen.
Create a schedule event of type Kuliah with weekly recurrence.
Save the schedule.
Go to calendar tab and switch between weekly and monthly views.
Verify that recurring events appear on correct recurring dates.

title: Notification Permission and Delivery
description: Verify that the app requests notification permission upon first use, handles user denial correctly, and sends reminders before tasks' deadline and schedule start times.

steps.description: Open the app first time to trigger notification permission request.
Verify permission dialog appears.
Deny notification permission and observe app behavior.
Verify app handles denied permission gracefully without crashes.
Allow notification permission and create a task with deadline coming soon.
Verify that the reminder notification is delivered before the deadline as configured.

title: Data Export Functionality
description: Verify that users can export their data including tasks, notes, schedules, and categories and that exported data is complete and correctly formatted.

steps.description: Navigate to settings and select data export option.
Perform data export.
Verify exported file contains all current tasks, notes, schedules, categories and is readable/shared.

title: Task and Note Category Management
description: Verify user can create, edit, delete custom categories with custom colors and assign tasks and notes to these categories.

steps.description: Navigate to category management screen.
Add new category with a custom name and color.
Verify category appears in category lists and can be selected during task/note creation.
Edit category name and color.
Verify changes reflect everywhere the category is used.
Delete category and verify reassignment or removal in tasks and notes.
Verify no orphaned category references remain.

title: UI Localization in Indonesian
description: Verify all user interface texts including dates and days are displayed correctly in the Indonesian language locale.

steps.description: Launch the app with Indonesian locale settings.
Verify that all UI strings including task statuses, labels, buttons and settings are in Indonesian.
Verify date and day formats follow Indonesian locale conventions.

title: Application Performance on Launch and Scrolling
description: Verify that app launch time and scroll performance meet user experience requirements under typical data load.

steps.description: Launch the app with a populated dataset of tasks, notes and schedules.
Measure and verify app launch time is within acceptable limits.
Navigate to task and notes lists and scroll through entries.
Verify scrolling is smooth without stutter or delay.

title: Verify Data Persistence and Crash Recovery
description: Validate all data is saved reliably in SQLite and remains intact after app crashes or forced terminations.

steps.description: Create several tasks, notes and schedules.
Force close or crash the app unexpectedly.
Relaunch the app.
Verify all previously saved data loads correctly and no data loss occurs.

title: Calendar Event Detail View Accessibility
description: Verify tapping on calendar date or event opens the event detail correctly showing full event information.

steps.description: Navigate to calendar tab.
Select a date that has scheduled events.
Tap on an event within that date.
Verify event detail view opens displaying all event attributes including type, title, recurrence, and notes.

title: Settings: Change Notification Preferences
description: Verify user can enable or disable notification reminders, and changes take effect accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to settings screen.
Toggle notification reminder settings off.
Verify no notifications are sent for tasks and schedules.
Toggle notification reminders on.
Verify notifications resume as configured.
